column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place has been around forever for a reason! It's damned delicious. On the most recent visit
column2: we had Catalan style crystal bread (manchego on the side)
column6: and vegetable paella. There are plenty of vegan options if you ask the server
column7: and service is friendly and attentive. It's busy in a festive way
